settings.title: Platinum Health is a Registered NDIS Provider
settings.description: Our mission is to provide people with disability the support they need to live an independent and fulfilling life, and to reach their full potential.

settings.title: We are dedicated to supporting individuals with disabilities to live a fulfilling life by providing high-quality products that meet their unique needs.
settings.description: As an NDIS registered provider, we offer a range of products that are funded by the National Disability Insurance Scheme (NDIS), ensuring that our clients receive the best possible care and support.Our passionate and committed team here at Platinum are experienced in helping people of all ages and varied conditions achieve their goals. Our goal is to strengthen independence and boost our customers' confidence. We can put together a plan to help you or your loved one now and into the future.

settings.title: NDIS Self-Managed, Plan Managed and Support Coordinators
settings.description: We work closely with Local Area Coordinators, NDIS Support Coordinators and Plan Managers throughout Australia, to ensure our expertise is readily available to all NDIS participants who may benefit from working with us. We can also assist self-managed NDIS participants with bookings and enquiries.Should you have any questions regarding your NDIS Agreement or how to make the most of your funding, please contact your local clinic or drop us a line and weâ€™ll be more than happy to assist.

settings.title: Plan Managed
settings.description: In case your NDIS Plan includes funding for a Plan Manager, we can organise billing through the Plan Manager provided that we receive a duly completed Biller Authorisation Form from the relevant Plan Management Agency

settings.title: Agency Provider Managed
settings.description: As a registered NDIS provider, Platinum Health Supply can directly claim payment through the NDIS Portal. To enable this option, it is necessary to complete a Service Agreement.

settings.title: Plan Managed
settings.description: In case your NDIS Plan includes funding for a Plan Manager, we can organise billing through the Plan Manager provided that we receive a duly completed Biller Authorisation Form from the relevant Plan Management Agency. Download the form by clicking this banner.

settings.heading: NDIS Consumables Enquiry Form
settings.description: If you would like to access your NDIS consumables online with Platinum Health Supply, please fill out the form below.
